item.title: Creating AppImages for PokeFinder and PokeGlitzer
item.description: This stuff is simply documenting my experience in trying to create AppImages for the aforementioned applications Background I have been running a set up based around Fedora Atomic Desktops for a while now. These operating systems use OS images as the main method of delivering updates and expect a container-based workflow. I also like to play around with Pok√©mon, particularly the technical side of it such as pseudorandom number generation (PRNG) manipulation and glitching around (particularly in Generation III).
